cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.description: Mojito is a traditional Cuban punch. It consists of five ingredients: white rum, sugar, lime juice, soda water, and mint. Its combination of sweetness, citrus, and herbaceous mint flavours complements the rum, making it a popular summer drink.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.description: The Cosmopolitan, or Cosmo, is a cocktail made with vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and fresh lime juice, garnished with a twist of orange peel. It gained popularity in the 1990s, particularly after being featured on the television show 'Sex and the City.'

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.description: The Old Fashioned is a classic cocktail made by muddling a sugar cube with bitters and a splash of water, then adding whiskey and ice, garnished with a twist of orange peel. It is a simple and timeless cocktail, popular for over a century.

cocktails.name: Piña Colada
cocktails.description: Transport yourself to the tropics with an exotic Piña colada. This creamy rum cocktail is made with fresh coconut cream and sharp pineapple juice to create a perfectly balanced drink that'll remind you of your favourite summer holiday. Best served with a funky umbrella for eye-candy appeal.

cocktails.name: Woo Woo
cocktails.description: Fresh, fruity and easy drinking, this classic 1980s cocktail features vodka, cranberry juice, peach schnapps and lime. It's made for summer sipping – preferably by the pool. It balances the sweetness of peach and cranberry with tart, zingy lime, making a simple and delicious tipple.

cocktails.name: Lava Flow Cocktail
cocktails.description: Made to resemble a real-life volcano, this creamy tropical cocktail slushy is chock-full of rum, strawberries, pineapple juice, and coconut. The lava flow effect involves blending the drink in two stages. Serve it in your favorite tiki glass for paradise in a cup from wherever you are.

cocktails.name: Mint Julep
cocktails.description: The Mint Julep is a refreshing bourbon cocktail that is traditionally served at the Kentucky Derby. It is made by muddling mint leaves with sugar and water, then filling the glass with crushed ice and topping it off with bourbon.

cocktails.name: Tequila Sunrise
cocktails.description: The Tequila Sunrise is a bright, citrusy cocktail made with tequila, orange juice, and grenadine. The grenadine creates a beautiful sunrise effect in the glass, making it a visually stunning drink that's perfect for warm, sunny days.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.description: The Whiskey Sour is a classic cocktail that combines the bold flavor of whiskey with the tangy taste of lemon juice and the sweetness of simple syrup. The optional addition of an egg white creates a smooth, frothy texture.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.description: The Daiquiri is a classic, refreshing cocktail made with white rum, fresh lime juice, and simple syrup. Its simplicity allows the flavors of the rum and lime to shine, making it a perfect choice for a warm day or a relaxed evening.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.description: The Negroni is a classic Italian cocktail that is both bitter and sweet, with a strong, complex flavor profile. Made with equal parts gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth, it is typically served on the rocks and garnished with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini
cocktails.description: The Espresso Martini is a sophisticated, caffeinated cocktail that combines the bold flavors of vodka, coffee liqueur, and freshly brewed espresso. It is perfect for those who want an energizing, after-dinner drink that is both elegant and delicious.
